version_description:
- NEW: You can now enable BEGIN+ mode if you have previously completed the story. In this mode, all text speeds are dramatically increased.
- NEW: You can now skip decoding puzzles if it's too hard.
- Adjusted ending difficulty.
- Minor dialogue changes.
- Minor bug fixes for certain devices.

- NEW: You can now enable BEGIN+ mode if you have previously completed the story. In this mode, all text speeds are dramatically increased.
- NEW: To enable subtitles in videos and phone calls, open the HELP section in the main menu.
- NEW: You can now skip decoding puzzles if it's too hard.
- Fixed crash on decoding puzzles for some users.
- Fixed audio stability issues.

- NEW: Optimised for iPhone X
- NEW: You can now enable subtitles in the Help menu
- Better video quality

- NEW: Optimised for iPhone X
- NEW: You can now enable subtitles in the Help menu
- Fix for devices running iOS 10 or lower from crashing... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

- NEW: Optimised for iPhone X
- NEW: You can now enable subtitles in the Help menu
- Fixed BEGIN+ not appearing after first playthrough.
- Fixed text alignment and video discoloration.
- Fix for devices running iOS 10 or lower from crashing.

- NEW: High quality videos
- NEW: Translations for 简体中文

- NEW: High quality videos
- NEW: Translations for 简体中文
- Fixed: Crash at certain endings (English)

- NEW: High quality videos
- NEW: Translations for 简体中文
- Fixed: Links in Browser that may break your save game
